column2: [target_spouse.GetTitledName], the [target_spouse.GetHusbandWife] of [target_ruler.GetTitledName], has been spending a few days in [capital.GetName]. It has been a very nice experience meeting [target_spouse.GetHerHim] - maybe our peoples are not that different after all.

Dear [target_ruler.GetTitledName],
During your [target_ruler.GetHusbandWifeOpp]'s recent visit to [capital.GetName] we had a great time discussing the similarities between our people. I suggest a non-aggression pact between us for the near future, and we will welcome any visitors from your realm with open arms.

Kind regards,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

Dear [Root.GetTitledName],

If this agreement can lead to a better understanding between our peoples, I will put effort into opening our borders to visitors from your realm.

Yours truly,
 [target_ruler.GetTitledName].

Dear [Root.GetTitledName],\n\nI am glad to hear you are well and that my [target_ruler.GetHusbandWifeOpp]'s visit was a good experience. Unfortunately, in these times pacts are broken left and right and to avoid going back on my word in the future, I would rather not give this kind of guarantee. I hope you understand.

A petty noble from [target_ruler_capital.GetName] has spent a week visiting [capital.GetName], constantly bragging about his wealth and estates back home, insulting his local peers and behaving like royalty. Your courtiers are quite sick of him and are asking you to take action.

Dear [target_ruler.GetTitledName],
We are having some trouble with one of your petty nobles who is visiting [capital.GetName]. His behavior being unacceptable would be quite an understatement, and I will have to take action soon.

Best wishes,
[From.GetTitledName]

Dear [Root.GetTitledName],
I'm sorry to hear about your annoying guest. I can assure you that he is not a noble from [target_ruler_capital.GetName]. If this scoundrel still remains in [capital.GetName], I hope you deal with it soon.

 Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

Dear [Root.GetTitledName],
I feel insulted that the first thing you do is accuse my people of being ill-behaved. Did you ever consider that he may be a fraud? Of course not, you [GetFromRootInsult].

All the best,
[From.GetTitledName]

My sincerest apologies [Root.GetTitledName], I realize that we made assumptions based on lies we were told and I hope this incident will soon be forgotten.

Kind regards,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName],
I should have known you would try to worm your way out of this matter. Responsibility never came easy to you, you [GetFromRootInsult]. Consider our agreement a thing of the past.

I hope you catch the plague,[From.GetTitledName]

Dear [Root.GetTitledName],
I hope this person has not caused too much trouble. I will inform my people of your customs so that misunderstandings can be avoided when they visit your realm. Thank you for offering a chance to correct this behavior.

Best wishes,
[From.GetTitledName]
I'll write to [target_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]. We could be friends.
I must show sympathy and explain.
Send a letter of apology to [From.GetTitledName]
This is no friend of ours!
Your courtiers will not like this.
I will swallow my pride and take responsibility.
I'm no fool, I can tell he's from [target_ruler_capital.GetName].
I will let this go, for now.
Pah! You are lying - but I will not take this further.
